episode_event_sinnoh_battle01/4001_1001_:
How is this possible? Ganging up on that
weak-looking kid should’ve been perfect!
This won’t do... This mission is a failure.
You leave us no option. We will retreat for now.

We shall do so because Team Galactic is
benevolent to all.
Those people are always such a mystery.

Their clothes are unique, almost like they’re aliens
from another world.

Thanks for helping me out again,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
But that does make me wonder...

Were those the only members of Team Galactic
on Pasio?
Oh, sorry. I was thinking about something.

I’ll do my best to prepare for a
worst-case scenario.
I guess it’s time to head back. Shall we?
episode_event_sinnoh_battle01/4002_1001_: (Team Galactic members have come to Pasio?)

(Yes... I still have my ideals for creating a
new world.)

(The ultimate world. A world of
complete perfection.)

(Nothing so vague and incomplete as spirit
can remain.)

(After all, a twisted world full of incomplete
human spirit...)
(That would be an intolerable nightmare indeed.)
